recordTypes.name: Trench Permit
recordTypes.description:
Applications for all Trench Permits. NOTE: If you will be removing or installing an underground propane tank, you will also need to complete an Underground Propane application with the Fire Department after receiving the Trench Permit. If you are excavating in a public way then you will need a Road Opening permit from the D.P.W.


If you are doing excavation work for water or sewer or utilities, all construction workers must wear personal protective equipment at all times.

recordTypes.name: Main Street Banner Application
recordTypes.description: Please choose this option to apply for a banner on Main Street.

recordTypes.name: Additions/Alterations
recordTypes.description: Use this permit for residential/commercial additions and alterations. (Including Decks)

recordTypes.name: Energy Storage Systems (ESS)
recordTypes.description:
*RESIDENTIAL ONLY* Use this permit for Solar or ESS installations. 
Please note you will need both this permit and an Electrical Permit. 
Also, a Utility Authorization Number from Groton Electric is required.

recordTypes.name: Demolition
recordTypes.description: Use this permit for residential/commercial demolition applications.

recordTypes.name: Electrical Permit
recordTypes.description:
You can find the application for electrical permits here.

If you are installing a Car Charger, then a Utility Authorization Number from Groton Electric is required.

recordTypes.name: Gas/LP Permit
recordTypes.description: You can find applications for gasfitting permits here. Please note, the applicant can not be the homeowner.

recordTypes.name: New Construction
recordTypes.description: Use this permit for residential/commercial New Construction projects.

recordTypes.name: Plumbing Permit
recordTypes.description: You can find applications for plumbing permits here. Please note, the applicant can not be the homeowner.

recordTypes.name: Sheds, Gazebos, Tents & Temporary Structures
recordTypes.description: Use this permit for all Sheds, Gazebos, Tents & other temporary structures.

recordTypes.name: Sheet Metal/Mechanical
recordTypes.description: Use this permit for Sheet Metal or Mechanical work.

recordTypes.name: Swimming Pool
recordTypes.description: If you are installing a pool and are supplied by town water in Zip Code 01450, you will need to acquire a secondary, non-essential water meter per the TOG Water Dept.
